name: Ultra Motocross Crazy
description:
Ultra Motocross Crazy is modern racing simulation and ultimate stunt dirt bike race game that will allows you tons of different brands of stunts trail bikes to thrill your way. All trail stunt bikes of this game are packed with physics based engine and dynamical characteristics.
Game Features;
- Realistic stunt ramps and stunts
- Ultra-Smooth and balancing control
- Multiple Realistic physics based stunt bikes
- Unique, rough and challenging stunts
- Beautiful 3D graphics and environment
